name: phanatik
title: Phanatik
desc: A bold, editorial template for digital publications and media brands.
article:
Phanatik is a high-contrast blog and podcast template with oversized headlines, clear structure, and support for paywalls, author profiles, and subscriber content.


  • Learn more about Phanatik
  • Get the full access bundle including all premium themes, and lifetime access: https://lexingtonthemes.com/

All Pages

  • 3x Landing Pages
  • About
  • Advertise
  • Membership
  • Team (CC)
  • Jobs (CC)
  • Blog x2 (CC)
  • Podcast (CC)
  • Authors (CC)
  • Legal pages (CC)
  • Sign in
  • Sign up
  • Contact
  • Password Reset
  • Error 404


(CC) = Content Collections

Features

  • Custom audio player
  • Podcast & blog tags
  • Podcast & blog Paywall
  • Podcast & blog Subscribers Only
  • Reusable components
  • Search powered with Fuse JS
  • Content collections
  • Seo Optimized
  • Ongoing updates
  • Style guide
  • Astro RSS
  • Astro SEO
  • Astro Sitemap
  • Tailwind CSS Forms
  • Tailwind Typography
